body:
On 05/27/2010 06:51 AM, Thomas Bleicher wrote:

Yes, Thomas. The solution I have works for now. I still want to look at
the other option (the first option you suggested) because I need this to
run at least under linux and mac. That solution seem to be more platform
independent. I will keep you posted.
Thanks for your help,
Ery
